posts.post_content: Looking for a the Obak Spokane Weed card. Here is an example.

This guy could probably help you:

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51467803804_4840c95154_z.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="trdcrdkid" post=2144271]This guy could probably help you:

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51467803804_4840c95154_z.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

That stuff is everywhere but if he has a hard to find Obak Weed card for sale I am interested.:)

I met a man named Ron at the Hofstra show in August. He had two stacks of Obaks. I bought some T206s from him, bought 3 C46s as well via email/mail.

I just shot him a note to check his inventory for you. Fingers crossed.

Thank you for the effort Kevin, I truly appreciate it.

Still looking if anyone has one for sale.
